cards.name: Addetto alla Colazione
cards.description: Una volta per round, puoi usare questa carta per ricevere 1 strudel

cards.name: Cameriera
cards.description: Una volta per round, puoi usare questa carta per ricevere 1 torta

cards.name: Barman
cards.description: Una volta per round, puoi usare questa carta per ricevere 1 vino

cards.name: Aiuto Cuoco
cards.description: Una volta per round, puoi usare questa carta per ricevere 1 caffè

cards.name: Stalliere
cards.description: Ogni volta che rimuovi dalla tua caffetteria un ospite rosso di cui hai completato l'ordine ricevi 2 corone

cards.name: Cocchiere
cards.description: Ogni volta che rimuovi dalla tua caffetteria un ospite blu di cui hai completato l'ordine puoi avanzare di 1 casella sul tracciato dell'Imperatore

cards.name: Massaggiatrice
cards.description: Ogni volta che rimuovi dalla tua caffetteria un ospite giallo di cui hai completato l'ordine ricevi 1 corona

cards.name: Guida Turistica
cards.description: Ogni volta che rimuovi dalla tua caffetteria un ospite verde di cui hai completato l'ordine ottieni 2 PV

cards.name: Maggiordomo
cards.description: D'ora in poi, ogni volta che prepari una camera blu (con qualsiasi azione o effetto) lo fai gratuitamente (paga 0 corone). Questi effetti non forniscono un'azione gratuita, ne rimuovono solo il costo

cards.name: Autista
cards.description: D'ora in poi, ogni volta che prepari una camera rossa (con qualsiasi azione o effetto) lo fai gratuitamente (paga 0 corone). Questi effetti non forniscono un'azione gratuita, ne rimuovono solo il costo

cards.name: Fioraia
cards.description: D'ora in poi, ogni volta che prepari una camera gialla (con qualsiasi azione o effetto) lo fai gratuitamente (paga 0 corone). Questi effetti non forniscono un'azione gratuita, ne rimuovono solo il costo

cards.name: Governante
cards.description: Ogni volta che prendi un dado di valore 3 o 4 ottieni immediatamente 2 PV

cards.name: Direttore di Ristorante
cards.description: Ogni volta che prendi un dado di valore 1 o 2 puoi aggiungere 1 alla forza di quell'azione.È possibile potenziarne ulteriormente la forza pagando 1 corona

cards.name: Decoratore
cards.description: Ogni volta che prendi un dado di valore 1 o 2, prima o dopo aver effettuato l'azione principale, puoi anche preparare 1 camera (di qualsiasi colore) pagandone il costo.Non potete effettuare azioni aggiuntive tra l'azione principale e la preparazione di questa camera. Questi effetti non forniscono un'azione gratuita, ne rimuovono solo il costo

cards.name: Lustrascarpe
cards.description: Non devi più scegliere quando prendi un dado di valore 4: per ogni dado in quest'area azione ricevi 1 corona e puoi avanzare di 1 casella sul tracciato dell'Imperatore.Come di consueto, è possibile potenziarne la forza pagando 1 corona,ricevendo indietro 1 corona e avanzando di 1 casella sul tracciato dell'Imperatore (praticamente guadagnando 1 casella gratuitamente)

cards.name: Lavandaia
cards.description: Ogni volta che prendi un dado di valore 4 ottieni immediatamente 4 PV

cards.name: Lavapiatti
cards.description: Non devi più pagare 1 corona quando prendi un dado di valore 6; inoltre puoi aggiungere 1 alla forza di questa azione. Come di consueto, è possibile potenziarne ulteriormente la forza pagando 1 corona. Solo per conoscenza, abbiamo aumentato da 3 a 5 corone il costo di questa carta rispetto alle precedenti edizioni

cards.name: Guardarobiera
cards.description: Ogni volta che prendi un dado di valore 5 puoi aggiungere 2 alla forza di questa azione. In altre parole, state ottenendo uno sconto aggiuntivo di 2 corone.

cards.name: Architetto d'Interni
cards.description: Ogni volta che prendi un dado di valore 3 ottieni immediatamente 5 PV

cards.name: Investigatore
cards.description: Ogni volta che prendi un dado di valore 5, prima o dopo aver effettuato l'azione principale, puoi anche avanzare di 2 caselle sul tracciato dell'Imperatore

cards.name: Cuoco
cards.description: Ottieni immediatamente (e solo una volta) 1 strudel, 1 torta, 1 vino e 1 caffè

cards.name: Responsabile dello Staff
cards.description: Ogni volta che prendi un dado di valore 3, prima o dopo aver effettuato l'azione principale,puoi anche giocare 1 carta staff dalla mano pagandone il costo. Non potete effettuare azioni aggiuntive tra l'azione principale e la giocata della carta staff

cards.name: Custode
cards.description: Ogni volta che occupi una camera (in qualsiasi modo) ricevi 1 corona

cards.name: Responsabile di Sala
cards.description: D'ora in poi, non paghi per spostare cibi e/o bevande dalla tua cucina ai tuoi ospiti

cards.name: Fattorino
cards.description: D'ora in poi, non paghi per prendere gli ospiti dalla coda. Questo effetto non fornisce un ospite, ne rimuove solo il costo

cards.name: Responsabile Congressi
cards.description: D'ora in poi, puoi pagare 1 corona per ignorare la penalità durante i conteggi dell'Imperatore

cards.name: Responsabile Prenotazioni
cards.description: Durante il conteggio finale, ottieni 3 PV aggiuntivi per ogni camera rossa occupata nel tuo hotel

cards.name: Portiere
cards.description: Durante il conteggio finale, ottieni 3 PV aggiuntivi per ogni camera blu occupata nel tuo hotel

cards.name: Segretaria
cards.description: Durante il conteggio finale, seleziona 1 carta staff in gioco di un avversario che abbia il simbolo e applica i suoi effetti al tuo hotel. Non potete usare questo effetto per copiare una vostra carta staff. Se nessun avversario ha in gioco carte staff col simbolo, la Segretaria non fornisce punti

cards.name: Addetto all'Accoglienza
cards.description: Durante il conteggio finale, ottieni 3 PV aggiuntivi per ogni camera gialla occupata nel tuo hotel

cards.name: Cameriera ai Piani
cards.description: Durante il conteggio finale, ottieni 1 PV aggiuntivo per ogni camera occupata nel tuo hotel, a prescindere dal colore

cards.name: Vicedirettore
cards.description: Durante il conteggio finale, ottieni 2 PV per ogni carta staff che hai giocato, a prescindere dal tipo (inclusa questa)

cards.name: Uomo delle Pulizie
cards.description: Ogni volta che ricevi la ricompensa per aver completato l'ordine di un ospite che richiede 4 o più cibi e/o bevande, ottieni 4 PV aggiuntivi

cards.name: Addetto al Ricevimento
cards.description: Durante il conteggio finale, ottieni 1 PV (aggiuntivo) per ogni camera nel tuo hotel, a prescindere dal colore e dal lato a faccia in su

cards.name: Paggio
cards.description: Occupa immediatamente (e solo una volta) fino a 2 camere (di qualsiasi colore) nel tuo hotel, girandole sul lato occupata

cards.name: Sommelier
cards.description: Ottieni immediatamente (e solo una volta) 4 vini

cards.name: Servizio in Camera
cards.description: Durante il conteggio finale, ottieni 2 PV per ogni gruppo di camere (di qualsiasi colore) completamente occupato nel tuo hotel

cards.name: Facchino
cards.description: Completa immediatamente (e solo una volta) l'ordine di un ospite prendendo i cibi e/o le bevande richiesti dalla riserva

cards.name: Pasticciere
cards.description: Ottieni immediatamente (e solo una volta) 4 torte

cards.name: Direttore Marketing
cards.description: Durante il conteggio finale, ottieni 5 PV per ogni carta obiettivo su cui hai collocato un tuo indicatore

cards.name: Centralinista
cards.description: Durante il conteggio finale, ottieni un numero di PV pari al doppio della tua posizione sul tracciato dell'Imperatore. Ricordate di indietreggiare di 7 caselle dopo il conteggio dell'Imperatore finale; pertanto, di solito otterrete al massimo 12 PV dalla Centralinista. Tuttavia, con le giuste condizioni potete ottenere più di 12 PV. Nelle precedenti edizioni non era consentito, adesso si

cards.name: Giardiniere
cards.description: Ogni volta che ricevi la ricompensa durante i conteggi dell'Imperatore ottieni 5 PV

cards.name: Barista
cards.description: Ottieni immediatamente (e solo una volta) 4 caffè

cards.name: Addetta alla Dispensa
cards.description: Ottieni immediatamente (e solo una volta) 4 strudel

cards.name: Bagnino
cards.description: Avanza immediatamente (e solo una volta) di 3 caselle sul tracciato dell'Imperatore

cards.name: Donna delle Pulizie
cards.description: Durante il conteggio finale, ottieni 5 PV per ogni piano nel tuo hotel con tutte le camere occupate

cards.name: Ascensorista
cards.description: Durante il conteggio finale, ottieni 5 PV per ogni colonna nel tuo hotel con tutte le camere occupate

cards.name: Direttore
cards.description: Durante il conteggio finale, ottieni 4 PV per ogni set formato da 1 camera rossa, 1 blu e 1 gialla occupate nel tuo hotel. In altre parole, ottenete 4 PV per ogni camera occupata del colore di cui ne avete di meno

cards.name: Scultore
cards.description: Puoi preparare 1 camera (di qualsiasi colore) senza pagarne il costo; devi scegliere una camera nei due piani più in basso della tua plancia hotel. Se i due piani più in basso sono già pieni di camere, temo non otterrete nulla da questo effetto

cards.name: Musicista
cards.description: Pesca 1 carta staff dal mazzo e aggiungila alla tua mano. Inoltre, puoi preparare 1 camera (di qualsiasi colore) pagando il normale costo

cards.name: Compositore
cards.description: Ricevi 1 strudel

cards.name: Sarto
cards.description: Ricevi 1 strudel e 2 corone

cards.name: Ballerina di Flamenco
cards.description: Ricevi 1 caffè e puoi avanzare di 2 caselle sul tracciato dell'Imperatore

cards.name: Ritrattista
cards.description: Ricevi 1 cibo o 1 bevanda a tua scelta e 2 corone

cards.name: Fotografo
cards.description: Pesca 2 carte staff dal mazzo e aggiungile alla tua mano

cards.name: Cantante
cards.description: Ricevi 1 torta. Inoltre, puoi giocare 1 carta staff dalla mano pagando fino a 3 corone in meno

cards.name: Architetto
cards.description: Puoi preparare fino a 2 camere (di qualsiasi colore) pagando ognuna 1 corona in meno

cards.name: Attrice
cards.description: Puoi occupare 1 camera aggiuntiva (di qualsiasi colore) girandola sul lato occupata. L'Attrice potrà usare una camera aggiuntiva per il suo staff

cards.name: Poeta
cards.description: Ricevi 1 torta. Inoltre, puoi giocare 1 carta staff dalla mano pagando fino a 2 corone in meno

cards.name: Orafo
cards.description: Ricevi 1 caffè e 3 corone

cards.name: Pittore
cards.description: Puoi preparare fino a 2 camere: paga 1 corona in meno per la prima; se scegli di prepararne una seconda, devi pagare il normale costo

cards.name: Cantante Lirica
cards.description: Puoi prendere 1 ospite dalla coda senza pagarne il costo. Inoltre, puoi avanzare di 3 caselle sul tracciato dell'Imperatore

cards.name: Dama
cards.description: Puoi prendere 1 ospite dalla coda senza pagarne il costo

cards.name: Duchessa
cards.description: Puoi giocare 1 carta staff dalla mano pagando 1 corona in meno

cards.name: Cavaliere dell'Impero
cards.description: Nessun effetto. Almeno vale 3 PV

cards.name: Langravia
cards.description: Puoi giocare 1 carta staff dalla mano pagando 1 corona in meno. Inoltre, puoi preparare 1 camera (di qualsiasi colore) pagando il normale costo

cards.name: Sovrano
cards.description: Pesca 2 carte staff dal mazzo e aggiungile alla tua mano. Inoltre, puoi avanzare di 2 caselle sul tracciato dell'Imperatore

cards.name: Principessa
cards.description: Puoi avanzare di 3 caselle sul tracciato dell'Imperatore

cards.name: Contessa
cards.description: Ricevi 3 corone

cards.name: Elettore
cards.description: Puoi giocare 1 carta staff dalla mano pagando 1 corona in meno. Inoltre, puoi avanzare di 3 caselle sul tracciato dell'Imperatore

cards.name: Barone
cards.description: Puoi preparare 1 camera (di qualsiasi colore) senza pagarne il costo

cards.name: Principe
cards.description: Puoi occupare 1 camera aggiuntiva (di qualsiasi colore) girandola sul lato occupata. Il Principe potrà usare una camera aggiuntiva per il suo entourage

cards.name: Conte
cards.description: Puoi giocare fino a 2 carte staff dalla mano pagando ognuna 1 corona in meno

cards.name: Viscote
cards.description: Ricevi 1 corona

cards.name: Baronessa
cards.description: Pesca 3 carte staff dal mazzo e giocane 1 immediatamente pagando fino a 3 corone in meno. Rimetti le altre 2 in fondo al mazzo nell'ordine che preferisci. Se non potete permettervi alcuna delle 3 carte oppure se non sono di vostro gradimento, dovrete rimetterle tutte in fondo al mazzo

cards.name: Duca
cards.description: Pesca 3 carte staff dal mazzo e giocane 1 immediatamente senza pagarne il costo. Rimetti le altre 2 in fondo al mazzo nell'ordine che preferisci

cards.name: Farmacista
cards.description: Ricevi 1 corona

cards.name: Consigliere Postale
cards.description: Puoi prendere 1 ospite dalla coda senza pagarne il costo

cards.name: Consigliere della Corona
cards.description: Ricevi 1 corona e puoi avanzare di 1 casella sul tracciato dell'Imperatore

cards.name: Professore Emerito
cards.description: Puoi prendere 1 ospite dalla coda senza pagarne il costo

cards.name: Generale
cards.description: Ricevi 1 vino e 3 corone

cards.name: Consigliere Anziano
cards.description: Puoi occupare 1 camera aggiuntiva (di qualsiasi colore) girandola sul lato occupata. Il Consigliere Anziano potrà usare una camera aggiuntiva per il suo segretario

cards.name: Consigliere del Commercio
cards.description: Ricevi 5 corone

cards.name: Consigliere di Corte
cards.description: Ricevi 3 corone. Inoltre, puoi prendere 1 ospite dalla coda senza pagarne il costo

cards.name: Maggiore
cards.description: Ricevi 3 corone

cards.name: Consigliere Veterinario
cards.description: Puoi giocare 1 carta staff dalla mano pagando fino a 3 corone in meno

cards.name: Consigliere Medico
cards.description: Ricevi 3 corone. Inoltre, puoi prendere fino a 2 ospiti dalla coda senza pagarne il costo. Rifornisci la coda prima di prendere il secondo ospite

cards.name: Procuratore
cards.description: Puoi preparare fino a 2 camere (di qualsiasi colore) senza pagarne il costo

cards.name: Lord Alto Commissario
cards.description: Ricevi 4 corone

cards.name: Assistente Legale Anziano
cards.description: Ricevi 1 vino e 3 corone

cards.name: Tezcatlipoca
cards.description: Pesca 3 carte staff dal mazzo e aggiungile alla tua mano

cards.name: Cap. Goldhaken
cards.description: Ricevi 1 corona

cards.name: Sig. Horsa
cards.description: Puoi avanzare di 1 casella sul tracciato dell'Imperatore

cards.name: M. Ingalls
cards.description: Puoi giocare 1 carta staff dalla mano pagando 1 corona in meno

cards.name: Sig. Boydell
cards.description: Puoi avanzare di 2 caselle sul tracciato dell'Imperatore. Attenzione: questo ospite non consente di rimuovere le macerie dai binari. (Ah Ah.) Tutto lo staff deve rimanere in hotel durante la partita

cards.name: Sig. Oundo
cards.description: Puoi giocare 1 carta staff dalla mano pagando fino a 3 corone in meno

cards.name: E. Gizia
cards.description: Seleziona un'area azione con almeno 1 dado e risolvi l'azione normalmente, ma senza rimuovere un dado da quell'area. Non puoi potenziare questa azione. Le carte staff che forniscono bonus per aver preso uno specifico dado non possono essere usate, perché non stai prendendo un dado con questo effetto. Questo non è un turno bonus, ma parte del turno corrente, subito dopo aver mandato E. Gizia in una camera e dopo aver riscosso ogni altro beneficio da lui. Ciò non influenza in alcun modo l'azione principale, per la quale si prende normalmente un dado. Solo per conoscenza, abbiamo indebolito l'effetto rispetto alle precedenti edizioni, in cui avreste ottenuto un intero turno aggiuntivo.

cards.name: M. Polo
cards.description: Ricevi 4 corone

cards.name: Cramersopholus
cards.description: Pesca 1 carta staff dal mazzo e aggiungila alla tua mano. Inoltre, puoi avanzare di 2 caselle sul tracciato dell'Imperatore

cards.name: Contadino Franz
cards.description: Puoi avanzare di 3 caselle sul tracciato dell'Imperatore. Inoltre, puoi occupare 1 camera aggiuntiva (di qualsiasi colore) girandola sul lato occupata. Il Contadino Franz e sua moglie potranno usare una camera aggiuntiva per i loro cinque figli.

cards.name: Fratello Uwe
cards.description: Puoi avanzare di 3 caselle sul tracciato dell'Imperatore. Inoltre, puoi prendere 1 ospite dalla coda senza pagarne il costo

cards.name: Conducente
cards.description: Puoi avanzare di 1 casella sul tracciato dell'Imperatore. Inoltre, puoi occupare 1 camera aggiuntiva (di qualsiasi colore) girandola sul lato occupata. Il Conducente potrà usare una camera aggiuntiva per il suo collega.

cards.name: Durgoing
cards.description: Pesca 2 carte staff dal mazzo e aggiungile alla tua mano

cards.name: MacLeod
cards.description: Puoi giocare 1 carta staff dalla mano senza pagarne il costo

cards.name: A
cards.description: Hai 20 corone

cards.name: A
cards.description: Il tuo indicatore ha raggiunto o superato la casella 10 del tracciato dell'Imperatore

cards.name: A
cards.description: Hai giocato almeno 6 carte staff (di qualsiasi tipo)

cards.name: A
cards.description: Ci sono almeno 12 tessere camera (di qualsiasi colore) sulla tua plancia hotel, non importa se libere o occupate

cards.name: B
cards.description: Almeno 2 piani (non necessariamente adiacenti) sono completamente occupati nel tuo hotel

cards.name: B
cards.description: Almeno 2 colonne (non necessariamente adiacenti) sono completamente occupate nel tuo hotel

cards.name: B
cards.description: Almeno 6 gruppi di camere (di qualsiasi colore, non necessariamente contigui) sono completamente occupati nel tuo hotel

cards.name: B
cards.description: Tutte le camere di almeno un colore sono occupate nel tuo hotel

cards.name: C
cards.description: Almeno 3 camere rosse, almeno 3 blu e almeno 3 gialle sono occupate nel tuo hotel

cards.name: C
cards.description: Almeno 4 camere rosse e almeno 3 gialle sono occupate nel tuo hotel

cards.name: C
cards.description: Almeno 4 camere gialle e almeno 3 blu sono occupate nel tuo hotel

cards.name: C
cards.description: Almeno 4 camere blu e almeno 3 rosse sono occupate nel tuo hotel

cards.name: Mag. Ferdinand
cards.description: You can advanced 3 spacres on the Emperor track

cards.name: Mr. Moras
cards.description: You can take a guest from the queue at no cost

cards.name: Dancing Master
cards.description: Each time you take a die showing 3, before or after taking the main action you can also send a dancer to the ballroom by paying the normal cost. Additionally, you get 1 krone. You may not take any additional actions between the main action and sending the dancer

cards.name: Violinist
cards.description: Immediately (and only once), you get 3 champagne

cards.name: Concertmaster
cards.description: Each time you take a die showing 1, after performing the action as normal, you get 1 champagne and score 1 VP. The additional champagne has no impact on the minimum quantities of strudel and cake

cards.name: Symphonist
cards.description: Once per round, you can spend exactly 1 champagne from your kitchen to score 5 VP

cards.name: Usherette
cards.description: Once per round, you can spend exactly 2 krones to get 1 champagne and score 3 VP

cards.name: Conductor
cards.description: Each time you take a die showing 4, you also get 1 champagne and 1 krone

cards.name: Choirmaster
cards.description: Each time you take a die showing 5, before or after taking the main action, you can also send a dancer to a ballrom, paying 1 champagne less. You may not take any additional actions between the main action and sending the dancer

cards.name: Leading Dancer
cards.description: During final scoring, score 2 VP for each dancer you have in all ballroom (including the balcony)

cards.name: Harpist
cards.description: Immedaiately (and only once) send up to 2 dancers to the same or different ballrooms, paying up to 2 champagne less for the first and 1 champagne less for the second. You may not take any additional actions in-between

cards.name: Cellist
cards.description: Once per round, you can spend exactly 1 dish or drink from your kitchen to send a dancer to a ballroom for 1 champagne less

cards.name: Pianist
cards.description: Once per round, you can use this card to get 1 champagne

cards.name: Ballet Master
cards.description: Each time you send a dancer to a ballroom, you also get 1 krone and you can draw 1 staff card from the deck

cards.name: Trumpeter
cards.description: Each time you take a die showing 2, after performing the action as normal, you get 1 champagne and you can draw 1 staff card from the deck. The additional champagne has no impact on the minimum quantities of strudel and cake

cards.name: Arranger
cards.description: Each time you place a marker on an objective card, you also get 2 champagne

cards.name: Danube Steamship Captain
cards.description: Once per round, after you play a staff card (except this one), you can send a dancer to a ballroom, paying 1 champagne less. You may not take any additional actions between the main action and sending the dancer

cards.name: Debutante
cards.description: You get 1 champagne

cards.name: Lady Companion
cards.description: You can advance 1 space on the Emperor track. Additionally, you can play a staff card from hand at no cost

cards.name: Governess
cards.description: You get 1 champagne

cards.name: Prima Ballerina
cards.description: You get 2 krones. Additionally, you can spend up to two dancers to the same or different ballrooms by paying the normal cost

cards.name: Mannequin
cards.description: You get 1 champagne. Additionally, you can play a stafff card from hand for up to 3 krones less

cards.name: Diva
cards.description: You get 2 champagne

cards.name: Waltz Queen
cards.description: No effect

cards.name: Khan
cards.description: You get 1 champagne

cards.name: Tenno
cards.description: You get 1 champagne. Additionally, you can prepare one room (of any color) for 1 krone less

cards.name: Laird
cards.description: You get 2 dishes and/or drinks of your choice (no champagne) . You can mix and match, e.g. take one cake and one coffee

cards.name: Maharani
cards.description: You get 1 champagne

cards.name: Marquis
cards.description: You get 2 champagne

cards.name: Contesa
cards.description: No effect. But she is worth 15 VP!

cards.name: Tsarina
cards.description: You can send a dancer to the ballroom for 1 champagne less. The Tsarina can book a room or go dancing; in either case, her spouse definitely goes dancing

cards.name: Ambassador
cards.description: You can send a dancer to a ballroom for the normal cost. The Ambassador can book a room or go dancing; in either case, her assistant definitely goes dancing

cards.name: Abbess
cards.description: You get 5 krones

cards.name: Consigliere
cards.description: You get 1 champagne and 2 krones

cards.name: Admiral Winterbottom
cards.description: You can advance 2 spaces on the Emperor track. Additionally, you can send a dancer to a ballroom by paying the normal cost. The Admiral can book a room or go dancing; in either case, his lieutenant definitely goes dancing

cards.name: Impresario
cards.description: You get 1 champagne

cards.name: Cardinal
cards.description: No effect. But he is worth 14 VP!

cards.name: Mayor
cards.description: You get 2 champagne. Additionally, you can send a dancer to a ballroom by paying the normal cost. The Mayor can book a room or go dancing; in either case, his secretary definitely goes dancing

cards.name: The Beast
cards.description: You get 1 champagne. Additionally, you can prepare one room (of any color) by paying the normal cost. Note that you lose 1 VP for the Beast

cards.name: Kapellmeister Palfy
cards.description: You get 2 champagne

cards.name: C. Inderella
cards.description: You can send a dancer to a ballroom by paying the normal cost. Additionally, you can occup a room (of any color) by turning it to the occupied side. C. Inderella can book a room or go dancing; in either case, one fo her friends definitely goes dancing - the other goes to bed

cards.name: Phantom
cards.description: You get 1 champagne. Additionally, you can take a guest from the queue at no cost. Note that you lose 2 VP for the Phantom

cards.name: The Beauty
cards.description:
You can send a dancer to a ballroom by paying the normal cost. Additionally, draw 3 staff cards from the deck and play one of them immediately, paying up to 3 krones less. Return the other two cards to the bottom of the deck, in an order of your choice.. The Beauty can book a room or go dancing; in either case, her sister definitely goes dancing.
If all three cards are too expensive for you, or you don't want to play any of them, you must return all three to the bottom of the deck

cards.name: Medium
cards.description: You get 2 dishes and/or drinks of your choice (no champagne). Additionally, you get 1 champagne. You can mix and match, e.g. take one cake and one coffee. And you get a champagne on top!

cards.name: Partyer
cards.description: You can send a dancer to a ballroom for up to 2 champagne less. The Partyer can book a room or go dancing; in either case his plus one definitely goes dancing

cards.name: Pope
cards.description: The Pope must move into a room; he cannot be sent to a ballroom. In return, you can occupy an additional room (of any color) by turning it to the occupied side. The Pope could use an additional room for his entourage

cards.name: A
cards.description: You have at least 7 champagne in your kitchen

cards.name: B
cards.description: You have at least 7 dancers across any number of ballrooms (including the balcony)

cards.name: C
cards.description: You have completed the orders of at least 4 green guests

cards.name: Handmaid
cards.description: After you advance 3 or more spaces on the Emperor track during an action, you can turn this card face down. If you do, you can immediately (and only once) prepare up to 2 rooms (of any colour) at no cost and immediately occupy them by turning them to the occupied side

cards.name: Apprentice
cards.description: After you complete a blue guest's order that required at least 3 items, you can turn this card face down. If you do, immediately (and only once) gain 3 strudel and 3 cake

cards.name: Dishwasher
cards.description: After you complete a red guest's order that required at least 3 items, you can turn this card face down. If you do, immediately (and only once) gain 3 wine and 3 coffee

cards.name: Tapster
cards.description: After you complete a yellow guest's order that required at least 3 items, you can turn this card face down. If you do, immediately (and only once) gain 6 krones

cards.name: Coachwoman
cards.description: Once per round, you can spend exactly 1 coffee from your kitchen. If you do so, score 3 VP and you can take a guest from the queue at no cost

cards.name: Bookkeeper
cards.description: Once per round, you can spend exactly 1 cake from your kitchen. If you do, you can prepare one room (of any colour), paying up to 2 krones less

cards.name: Chef de Rang
cards.description: After you get 3 or more drinks (wine and/or coffee) from an action, you can turn this card face down. If you do, immediately (and only once) advance 5 spaces on the Emperor track

cards.name: Interpreter
cards.description: Once per round, you can spend exactly 2 strudel from your kitchen to get 2 krones and score 2 VP

cards.name: Bartender
cards.description: After you get 3 or more dishes (strudel and/or cake) during an action, you can turn this card face down. If you do, you can immediately (and only once) take a guest from the queue at no cost and immediately fill their order by taking all of their required items from the supply

cards.name: Wagon Master
cards.description: Once per round, you can spend exactly 2 dishes and/or drinks (no champagne) from your kitchen to get 2 others dishes and/or drinks (different from those spent; no champagne) and score 2 VP

cards.name: Dog Walker
cards.description: Once per round, you can spend exactly 2 wine from your kitchen to score 2 VP and advance 2 spaces on the Emperor track

cards.name: Hairdresser
cards.description: Once per round, you can retreat exactly 2 spaces on the Emperor track to play a staff card from hand for up to 3 krones less

cards.name: Janitor
cards.description: After you fully occupy a group (of any colour) comprising of at least 3 rooms, you can turn this card face down. If you do, you can immediately (and only once) play up to 2 staff cards from hand at no cost

cards.name: Entertainer
cards.description: After you place a marker on an objective card, you can turn this card face down. If you do, you can immediately (and only once) fill up to two guests orders by taking the required items from the supply

cards.name: A
cards.description: You have at least 3 strudels, at least 3 cake, at least 3 wine and at least 3 coffee in your kitchen

cards.name: B
cards.description: At least 3 rooms (of any color) in the top floor of your hotel are occupied

cards.name: C
cards.description:
You have completed orders of at least 5 guests who each ordered 3 or more items. To keep track do not discard the guests relevant to this objective, but keep them in a personal face-down pile, until you complete this objective. Only then place them in the discuard pile. 
When using module 3, as the Kaufman player, you will need to keep two separate piles: one collecting the guests whose order you completed this round and another one collecting the guests relevant to this objective. At the end of round, you score VP onl for the guests in the first pile, before moving any relevant guests to the second pile and discarding the rest.

cards.name: Manager's Son
cards.description: Each time you spend at least 1 champagne during an action, you get 1 krone

cards.name: E. Doolittle
cards.description:
Eliza must be sen to a ballroom; she cannot move into a room. In return, you can send an additional dancer that you must place on the same ballroom space as Eliza. You must pay the cost printed on the space only once (for Eliza only) and you get the row bonus only once.
Afterwards, score 1 VP for each dancer token you have in a ballroom, including Eliza and the second dancer token on the same space. I could have danced all night...

cards.name: M. Antoinette
cards.description:
Marie must move into a room. Additionally, you can send a dancer to a ballroom by paying 1 fewer champagne per other player in the game. In return, each other player gets 1 dish or drink of their choice (no champagne)
If you move Marie to her room in rounds 1-3, score 8 VP; in rounds 4-5 score 5 VP; in rounds 6-7, score 2 VP. Marie occupies a room and goes dancing anyway

cards.name: Lord Mayor of London
cards.description: Immediately score the current ballroom. It will be scored again as normal after the next Emperor scoring. Of couse, all players must participate in this additional scoring

cards.name: J. Gatsby & D. Buchanan
cards.description: Jay and Daisy must move into a room; they cannot be sent to a ballroom. In return, you can occupy an additional room (of any color) by turning it to the occupied side. Additionally, advance 4 spaces on the Emperor track. Please note that the cost is two of each depicted item. They prefer to stay in their rooms

cards.name: Ms. Hildegard
cards.description: Ms. Hildegard must move into a room; she cannot be sent to a ballroom

cards.name: Dr. Hagedorn
cards.description: Dr. Hagedorn cannot be sent to a ballroom, he must occupy two horizontally adjacent rooms (of the same or different colors). . Dr. Hageborn requires a double suite. If your hotel doesn't have oe, he'll wait at his table until you make one available

cards.name: Mr. Schulze
cards.description: Mr. Schulze can neither be sent to a ballroom nor occupy a room - he stays at his table indefinitely (which is why he has no cost). Instead, he is like a staff card (but is not considered one) that allows you, once per round, to spend any one item (dish, drink or champagne). If you do, you can immediately play a staff card from hand by paying its cost, score 1VP, and advance 1 space on the Emperor track. During final scoring, you do not lose 5 victory points for Mr. Schulze, even though he is still sitting in your café.

cards.name: J. Kesselhut
cards.description: Immediately fill the wine orders of your remaining guests with wine from the supply

cards.name: Mrs. Kunkel
cards.description: Mrs. Kunkel cannot be sent to a ballroom and she must occupy a room in the bottom floor. If you have no vacant rooms in the bottom floor left, ýou must make do with one fewer table for the rest of the game and, during final scoring suffer the negative 5 victory points for Mrs. Kunkel

cards.name: Breakfast Server
cards.description: Once per round, you can use this card to get 1 strudel

cards.name: Waitress
cards.description: Once per round, you can use this card to get 1 cake

cards.name: Barkeeper
cards.description: Once per round, you can use this card to get 1 wine

cards.name: Sous-Chef
cards.description: Once per round, you can use this card to get 1 coffee

cards.name: Groom
cards.description: Each time you remove a red guest whose order you completed from your café, you get 2 krones

cards.name: Stableman
cards.description: Each time you remove a blue guest whose order you completed from your café, you can advance 1 space on the Emperor track

cards.name: Masseuse
cards.description: Each time you remove a yellow guest whose order you completed from your café, you get 1 krone

cards.name: Tour Guide
cards.description: Each time you remove a green guest whose order you completed from your café, you score 2 VP

cards.name: Butler
cards.description: From now on, whenever you prepare a blue room (from any action or effort), it is free to do so (ie pay 0 krones). This does not grant a free action, it merely removes the cost

cards.name: Chauffeur
cards.description: From now on, whenever you prepare a red room (from any action or effort), it is free to do so (ie pay 0 krones). This does not grant a free action, it merely removes the cost

cards.name: Florist
cards.description: From now on, whenever you prepare a yellow room (from any action or effort), it is free to do so (ie pay 0 krones). This does not grant a free action, it merely removes the cost

cards.name: Executive Housekeeper
cards.description: Each time you take a die showing 3 or 4, immediately score 2 VP

cards.name: Restaurant Manager
cards.description: Each time you take a die showing 1 or 2, you can add 1 to the strenght of that action. As always, you can boost this further by paying 1 krone

cards.name: Decorator
cards.description: Each time you take a die showing 1 or 2, before or after taking the main action, you can also prepare one room (of any color) by paying the normal cost. You may not take any additional actions between the main action and preparing that room

cards.name: Bootblack
cards.description: You no longer have to choose when taking a die showing 4: For each die on the action space, you get 1 krone and you can advance 1 space on the Emperor track.. As always, you can boost this further by paying 1 krone, for which you will also get 1 krone (back) and advance 1 space on the Emperor track, effectively gaining one space for free

cards.name: Laundress
cards.description: Each time you take a die showing 4, immediately score 4 VP

cards.name: Kitchen Hand
cards.description: You no longer have to pay 1 krone when taking a die showing a 6; additionally, you can add 1 to the strength of this action.. As always, you can boost this by paying 1 krone. FYI: we increased the cost of this card from 3 krones to 5 krones

cards.name: Checker
cards.description: Each time you take a die showing 5, you can add 2 to the strength of this action. In other words, you are getting an additional discount of 2 krones

cards.name: Interior Architect
cards.description: Each time you take a die showing 3, immediately score 5 VP

cards.name: Detective
cards.description: Each time you take a die showing 5, before or after taking the main action, you can also advance 2 spaces on the Emperor track. You may not take any additional actions between the main action and advancing on the Emperor track

cards.name: Chef
cards.description: Immediately (and only once) gain 1 strudel, 1 cake, 1 wine and 1 coffee

cards.name: Staff Manager
cards.description: Each time you take a die showing 3, before or after taking the main action you can also play a staff card from hand by paying its cost. You may not take any additional actions between the main action and playing the staff card

cards.name: Custodian
cards.description: Each time you occupy a room (by whichever means), you also get 1 krone

cards.name: Chief Waiter
cards.description: From now on, moving items from your kitchen onto your guests costs you nothing

cards.name: Delivery Boy
cards.description: From now on, taking guests from the queue costs you nothing. This does not provide a guest, it merely removes the cost

cards.name: Conference Manager
cards.description: From now on, you can pay 1 krone to ignore the penalty during an Emperor scoring

cards.name: Booking manager
cards.description: During final scoring, score an additonal 3 VP for each occupied red room in your hotel

cards.name: Concierge
cards.description: During final scoring, score an additonal 3 VP for each occupied blue room in your hotel

cards.name: Secretary
cards.description: During final scoring, select an opponent's staff card in play with the (End Game) symbol and apply its effect to your hotel. You may not use this to copy one of your staff. If none of you opponents have staff with the (End Game) symbol in play, the secretary scores nothing.

cards.name: Reception Clerk
cards.description: During final scoring, score an additonal 3 VP for each occupied yellow room in your hotel

cards.name: Chambermaid
cards.description: During final scoring, score an additonal 1 VP for each occupied room in your hotel, regardless of color

cards.name: Assistant Manager
cards.description: During final scoring, score 2 VP for each staff card you have in play (regardless of type), including this

cards.name: Male Floor Housekeeper
cards.description: Each time you remove a red guest whose order you completed from your café, if the order required 4 (or more) items, score 4 VP

cards.name: Receptionist
cards.description: During final scoring, score (an additional) 1 VP for each room tile in your  hotel, regardless of color and which side is facing up

cards.name: Page Boy
cards.description: Immediately (and only once) occupy up to 2 rooms (of any color) in you hotel by turning them to the occupied side

cards.name: Sommelier
cards.description: Immediately (and only once) gain 4 wine

cards.name: Room Service
cards.description: During final scoring, score 2 VP for each fully occupied group of rooms (of any color) in your hotel

cards.name: Porter
cards.description: Immediately (and only once) fill a guest's order by taking the required items from the supply

cards.name: Confectioner
cards.description: Immediately (and only once) gain 4 cake

cards.name: Marketing Director
cards.description: During final scoring, score 5 VP for each objective card that has your marker on it

cards.name: Operator
cards.description: During final scoring, score a number of VP equal to double your position on the Emperor track. Remember, you lose 7 spaces after the final Emperor scoring; as such, you will usually score at most 12 VP from the Operator. Under the right conditions, though, you can get more than 12 VP from this. This wasn't allowed in earlier prints, but it is now

cards.name: Gardener
cards.description: Each time you get the reward during the Emperor scoring, in addition, score 5 VP

cards.name: Barista
cards.description: Immediately (and only once) gain 4 coffee

cards.name: Larder Cook
cards.description: Immediately (and only once) gain 4 strudel

cards.name: Pool Attendant
cards.description: Immediately (and only once) advance 3 spaces on the Emperor track

cards.name: Female Floor Housekeeper
cards.description: During final scoring, score 5 VP for each floor in your hotel that has all of its rooms occupied

cards.name: Liftboy
cards.description: During final scoring, score 5 VP for each column in your hotel that has all of its rooms occupied

cards.name: Hotel Manager
cards.description: During final scoring, score 4 VP for each set of occupied red, blue and yellow rooms that you have in your hotel. In other words, you get 4 VP for each occupied room of the color that you have the least of

cards.name: Sculptor
cards.description: You can prepare one room (of any color) at no cost; you must choose a room in the bottom two floors of your hotel board. If the bottom two floors are full of rooms already, you get nothing from this I'm afraid

cards.name: Musician
cards.description: Draw 1 staff card from the deck and add it to your hand. Additionally, you can prepare one room (of any color) by paying the normal cost

cards.name: Composer
cards.description: You get 1 strudel

cards.name: Tailor
cards.description: You get 1 strudel and 2 krones

cards.name: Flamenco Dancer
cards.description: You get 1 coffee and you can advance 2 spaces on the Emperor track

cards.name: Portrait Painter
cards.description: You get 1 dish or drink of your choice, and 2 krones

cards.name: Photographer
cards.description: Draw 2 staff cards from the deck and add them to your hand

cards.name: Vocalist
cards.description: You get 1 cake. Additionally, you can play a staff card from hand, paying up to 3 krones less

cards.name: Architect
cards.description: You can prepare up to two rooms (of any color), paying 1 krone less for each

cards.name: Actress
cards.description: You can occupy an additional room (of any color) by turning it to the occupied side. The actress could use an additional room for her staff

cards.name: Poet
cards.description: You get 1 cake. Additionally, you can play a staff card from hand, paying up to 2 krones less

cards.name: Jewelry Designer
cards.description: You get 1 coffee and 3 krones

cards.name: Painter
cards.description: You can prepare up to two rooms: Pay 1 krone less for one of them; if you choose to prepare a second, you must pay the normal cost

cards.name: Opera Singer
cards.description: You can take a guest from the queue at no cost. Additionally, you can advance 3 spaces on the Emperor track

cards.name: Dame
cards.description: You can take a guest from the queue at no cost

cards.name: Duchess
cards.description: You can play a staff card from hand, paying 1 krone less

cards.name: Knight of the Empire
cards.description: No effect. At least he is worth 3 VP

cards.name: Landgrave
cards.description: You can play a staff card from hand, paying 1 krone less- Additionally, you can prepare one room (of any color) by paying the normal cost

cards.name: Sovereign
cards.description: Draw 2 staff cards from the the deck and add them to your hand. Additionally, you can advance 2 spaces on the Emperor track

cards.name: Princess
cards.description: You can advance 3 spaces on the Emperor track

cards.name: Countess
cards.description: You get 3 krones

cards.name: Elector
cards.description: You can play a staff card from hand, paying 1 krone less. Additionally, you can advance 3 spaces on the Emperor track

cards.name: Baron
cards.description: You can prepare one room (of any color) at no cost

cards.name: Prince
cards.description: You can occupy an additional room (of any color) by turning it to the occupied side. The prince could use an additioanl room for his entourage

cards.name: Countess
cards.description: You can play up to two staff cards from hands, paying 1 krone less for each

cards.name: Earl
cards.description: You get 1 krone

cards.name: Baroness
cards.description: Draw 3 staff cards from the deck and play one of them immediately, paying up to 3 krones less. Return the other two cards to the bottom of the deck, in an order of your choice. If all three cards are too expensive for you, or you don't want to play any of them, you must return all three to the bottom of the deck

cards.name: Duke
cards.description: Draw 3 staff cards from the deck and immediately play one of them at no cost. Return the other two cards to the bottom of the deck, in an order of your choice

cards.name: Apothecary
cards.description: You get 1 krone

cards.name: Post Councillor
cards.description: You can take a guest from the queue at no cost

cards.name: Privy Councillor
cards.description: You get 1 krone and you can advance 1 space on the Emperor track

cards.name: Professor Emeritus
cards.description: You can take a guest from the queue at no cost

cards.name: General
cards.description: You get 1 wine and 3 krones

cards.name: Senior Councillor
cards.description: You can occupy an additional room (of any color) by turning it to the occupied side. The Senior Councillor could use an additional room for his secretary

cards.name: Councillor of Commerce
cards.description: You get 5 krones

cards.name: Court Councillor
cards.description: You get 3 krones. Additionally, you can take a guest from the queue at no cost

cards.name: Major
cards.description: You get 3 krones

cards.name: Veterinary Councillor
cards.description: You can play a staff card from hand, paying up to 3 krones less

cards.name: Medicinal Councillor
cards.description: You get 3 krones. Additionally, you can take up to two guest from the queue at no cost. Replenish the queue before taking the second guest

cards.name: Procurator
cards.description: You can prepare up to two rooms (of any color), both at no cost

cards.name: Lord High Commissioner
cards.description: You get 4 krones

cards.name: Senior Legal Secretary
cards.description: You get 1 wine and 3 krones

cards.name: Tezcatlipoca
cards.description: Draw 3 staff cards from the deck and add them to your hand

cards.name: Capt. Goldhaken
cards.description: You get 1 krone

cards.name: Mr. Horsa
cards.description: You can advance 1 space on the Emperor track

cards.name: M. Ingalls
cards.description: You can play a staff card from hand, paying 1 krone less

cards.name: Mr. Boydell
cards.description: You can advanced 2 spaces on the Emperor track. Please note: This does not allow you to clear rubble from the track - all staff must stay in the hotel during this game

cards.name: Mr. Oundo
cards.description: You can play a staff card from hand, paying up to 3 krones less

cards.name: E. Gizia
cards.description: Select an action space with at least one die and carry out the action as normal, but without taking a die from that space. You cannot boost this action. Staff cards providing benefits for taking a specific die cannot be used, because you are not taking a die with this.. This is not a bonus turn, but part of your current turn, right after sending E. Gizia to a room and collecting all other benefits from him. This does not affect your main action, for which you do take a die, in any way. For our information; We've weakended the effect from previous editions, in which you would get an additional turn

cards.name: M. Polo
cards.description: You get 4 krones

cards.name: Cramersopholus
cards.description: Draw 1 staff card from the deck and add it to your hand. Additionally, you can advance 2 spaces on the Emperor track

cards.name: Farmer Franz
cards.description: You can advance 3 spaces on the Emperor track. Additionally, you can occupy an additional room (of any color) by turning it to the occupied side. Farmer Franz and his spouse could use an additional room for their five children

cards.name: Brother Uwe
cards.description: You can advance 3 spaces on the Emperor track. Additionally, you can take a guest from the queue at no cost

cards.name: Conductor
cards.description: You can advance 1 space on the Emperor track. Additionally, you can occupy an additional room (of any color) by turning it to the occupied side.. The conductor could use an additional room for his colleague

cards.name: Durgoing
cards.description: Draw 2 staff cards from the deck and add them to your hand

cards.name: MacLeod
cards.description: You can play a staff card from hand at no cost

cards.name: A
cards.description: You have 20 krones

cards.name: A
cards.description: Your marker is on space 10 of the Emperor track or higher

cards.name: A
cards.description: You have played at least 6 staff cards (of any types)

cards.name: A
cards.description: There are at least 12 room tiles (of any color) on your hotel board. It does not matter whether they are vacant or occupied

cards.name: B
cards.description: At least 2 floors in your hotel are fully occupied. These floors need not be adjacent

cards.name: B
cards.description: At least 2 columns in your hotel are fully occupied. These columns need not be adjacent

cards.name: B
cards.description: At least 6 groups of rooms in your hotel (of any colors) are fully occupied. The groups need not be contiguous

cards.name: B
cards.description: All rooms of at least one color in your hotel are occupied

cards.name: C
cards.description: You have at least 3 red, at least 3 blue and at least 3 yellow occupied rooms in your hotel

cards.name: C
cards.description: You have at least 4 red and at least 3 yellow occupied rooms in your hotel

cards.name: C
cards.description: You have at least 4 yellow and at least 3 blue occupied rooms in your hotel

cards.name: C
cards.description: You have at least 4 blue and at least 3 red occupied rooms in your hotel

cards.name: Mag. Ferdinand
cards.description: You can advanced 3 spacres on the Emperor track

cards.name: Mr. Moras
cards.description: You can take a guest from the queue at no cost

cards.name: Dancing Master
cards.description: Each time you take a die showing 3, before or after taking the main action you can also send a dancer to the ballroom by paying the normal cost. Additionally, you get 1 krone. You may not take any additional actions between the main action and sending the dancer

cards.name: Violinist
cards.description: Immediately (and only once), you get 3 champagne

cards.name: Concertmaster
cards.description: Each time you take a die showing 1, after performing the action as normal, you get 1 champagne and score 1 VP. The additional champagne has no impact on the minimum quantities of strudel and cake

cards.name: Symphonist
cards.description: Once per round, you can spend exactly 1 champagne from your kitchen to score 5 VP

cards.name: Usherette
cards.description: Once per round, you can spend exactly 2 krones to get 1 champagne and score 3 VP

cards.name: Conductor
cards.description: Each time you take a die showing 4, you also get 1 champagne and 1 krone

cards.name: Choirmaster
cards.description: Each time you take a die showing 5, before or after taking the main action, you can also send a dancer to a ballrom, paying 1 champagne less. You may not take any additional actions between the main action and sending the dancer

cards.name: Leading Dancer
cards.description: During final scoring, score 2 VP for each dancer you have in all ballroom (including the balcony)

cards.name: Harpist
cards.description: Immedaiately (and only once) send up to 2 dancers to the same or different ballrooms, paying up to 2 champagne less for the first and 1 champagne less for the second. You may not take any additional actions in-between

cards.name: Cellist
cards.description: Once per round, you can spend exactly 1 dish or drink from your kitchen to send a dancer to a ballroom for 1 champagne less

cards.name: Pianist
cards.description: Once per round, you can use this card to get 1 champagne

cards.name: Ballet Master
cards.description: Each time you send a dancer to a ballroom, you also get 1 krone and you can draw 1 staff card from the deck

cards.name: Trumpeter
cards.description: Each time you take a die showing 2, after performing the action as normal, you get 1 champagne and you can draw 1 staff card from the deck. The additional champagne has no impact on the minimum quantities of strudel and cake

cards.name: Arranger
cards.description: Each time you place a marker on an objective card, you also get 2 champagne

cards.name: Danube Steamship Captain
cards.description: Once per round, after you play a staff card (except this one), you can send a dancer to a ballroom, paying 1 champagne less. You may not take any additional actions between the main action and sending the dancer

cards.name: Debutante
cards.description: You get 1 champagne

cards.name: Lady Companion
cards.description: You can advance 1 space on the Emperor track. Additionally, you can play a staff card from hand at no cost

cards.name: Governess
cards.description: You get 1 champagne

cards.name: Prima Ballerina
cards.description: You get 2 krones. Additionally, you can spend up to two dancers to the same or different ballrooms by paying the normal cost

cards.name: Mannequin
cards.description: You get 1 champagne. Additionally, you can play a stafff card from hand for up to 3 krones less

cards.name: Diva
cards.description: You get 2 champagne

cards.name: Waltz Queen
cards.description: No effect

cards.name: Khan
cards.description: You get 1 champagne

cards.name: Tenno
cards.description: You get 1 champagne. Additionally, you can prepare one room (of any color) for 1 krone less

cards.name: Laird
cards.description: You get 2 dishes and/or drinks of your choice (no champagne) . You can mix and match, e.g. take one cake and one coffee

cards.name: Maharani
cards.description: You get 1 champagne

cards.name: Marquis
cards.description: You get 2 champagne

cards.name: Contesa
cards.description: No effect. But she is worth 15 VP!

cards.name: Tsarina
cards.description: You can send a dancer to the ballroom for 1 champagne less. The Tsarina can book a room or go dancing; in either case, her spouse definitely goes dancing

cards.name: Ambassador
cards.description: You can send a dancer to a ballroom for the normal cost. The Ambassador can book a room or go dancing; in either case, her assistant definitely goes dancing

cards.name: Abbess
cards.description: You get 5 krones

cards.name: Consigliere
cards.description: You get 1 champagne and 2 krones

cards.name: Admiral Winterbottom
cards.description: You can advance 2 spaces on the Emperor track. Additionally, you can send a dancer to a ballroom by paying the normal cost. The Admiral can book a room or go dancing; in either case, his lieutenant definitely goes dancing

cards.name: Impresario
cards.description: You get 1 champagne

cards.name: Cardinal
cards.description: No effect. But he is worth 14 VP!

cards.name: Mayor
cards.description: You get 2 champagne. Additionally, you can send a dancer to a ballroom by paying the normal cost. The Mayor can book a room or go dancing; in either case, his secretary definitely goes dancing

cards.name: The Beast
cards.description: You get 1 champagne. Additionally, you can prepare one room (of any color) by paying the normal cost. Note that you lose 1 VP for the Beast

cards.name: Kapellmeister Palfy
cards.description: You get 2 champagne

cards.name: C. Inderella
cards.description: You can send a dancer to a ballroom by paying the normal cost. Additionally, you can occup a room (of any color) by turning it to the occupied side. C. Inderella can book a room or go dancing; in either case, one fo her friends definitely goes dancing - the other goes to bed

cards.name: Phantom
cards.description: You get 1 champagne. Additionally, you can take a guest from the queue at no cost. Note that you lose 2 VP for the Phantom

cards.name: The Beauty
cards.description:
You can send a dancer to a ballroom by paying the normal cost. Additionally, draw 3 staff cards from the deck and play one of them immediately, paying up to 3 krones less. Return the other two cards to the bottom of the deck, in an order of your choice.. The Beauty can book a room or go dancing; in either case, her sister definitely goes dancing.
If all three cards are too expensive for you, or you don't want to play any of them, you must return all three to the bottom of the deck

cards.name: Medium
cards.description: You get 2 dishes and/or drinks of your choice (no champagne). Additionally, you get 1 champagne. You can mix and match, e.g. take one cake and one coffee. And you get a champagne on top!

cards.name: Partyer
cards.description: You can send a dancer to a ballroom for up to 2 champagne less. The Partyer can book a room or go dancing; in either case his plus one definitely goes dancing

cards.name: Pope
cards.description: The Pope must move into a room; he cannot be sent to a ballroom. In return, you can occupy an additional room (of any color) by turning it to the occupied side. The Pope could use an additional room for his entourage

cards.name: A
cards.description: You have at least 7 champagne in your kitchen

cards.name: B
cards.description: You have at least 7 dancers across any number of ballrooms (including the balcony)

cards.name: C
cards.description: You have completed the orders of at least 4 green guests

cards.name: Handmaid
cards.description: After you advance 3 or more spaces on the Emperor track during an action, you can turn this card face down. If you do, you can immediately (and only once) prepare up to 2 rooms (of any colour) at no cost and immediately occupy them by turning them to the occupied side

cards.name: Apprentice
cards.description: After you complete a blue guest's order that required at least 3 items, you can turn this card face down. If you do, immediately (and only once) gain 3 strudel and 3 cake

cards.name: Dishwasher
cards.description: After you complete a red guest's order that required at least 3 items, you can turn this card face down. If you do, immediately (and only once) gain 3 wine and 3 coffee

cards.name: Tapster
cards.description: After you complete a yellow guest's order that required at least 3 items, you can turn this card face down. If you do, immediately (and only once) gain 6 krones

cards.name: Coachwoman
cards.description: Once per round, you can spend exactly 1 coffee from your kitchen. If you do so, score 3 VP and you can take a guest from the queue at no cost

cards.name: Bookkeeper
cards.description: Once per round, you can spend exactly 1 cake from your kitchen. If you do, you can prepare one room (of any colour), paying up to 2 krones less

cards.name: Chef de Rang
cards.description: After you get 3 or more drinks (wine and/or coffee) from an action, you can turn this card face down. If you do, immediately (and only once) advance 5 spaces on the Emperor track

cards.name: Interpreter
cards.description: Once per round, you can spend exactly 2 strudel from your kitchen to get 2 krones and score 2 VP

cards.name: Bartender
cards.description: After you get 3 or more dishes (strudel and/or cake) during an action, you can turn this card face down. If you do, you can immediately (and only once) take a guest from the queue at no cost and immediately fill their order by taking all of their required items from the supply

cards.name: Wagon Master
cards.description: Once per round, you can spend exactly 2 dishes and/or drinks (no champagne) from your kitchen to get 2 others dishes and/or drinks (different from those spent; no champagne) and score 2 VP

cards.name: Dog Walker
cards.description: Once per round, you can spend exactly 2 wine from your kitchen to score 2 VP and advance 2 spaces on the Emperor track

cards.name: Hairdresser
cards.description: Once per round, you can retreat exactly 2 spaces on the Emperor track to play a staff card from hand for up to 3 krones less

cards.name: Janitor
cards.description: After you fully occupy a group (of any colour) comprising of at least 3 rooms, you can turn this card face down. If you do, you can immediately (and only once) play up to 2 staff cards from hand at no cost

cards.name: Entertainer
cards.description: After you place a marker on an objective card, you can turn this card face down. If you do, you can immediately (and only once) fill up to two guests orders by taking the required items from the supply

cards.name: A
cards.description: You have at least 3 strudels, at least 3 cake, at least 3 wine and at least 3 coffee in your kitchen

cards.name: B
cards.description: At least 3 rooms (of any color) in the top floor of your hotel are occupied

cards.name: C
cards.description:
You have completed orders of at least 5 guests who each ordered 3 or more items. To keep track do not discard the guests relevant to this objective, but keep them in a personal face-down pile, until you complete this objective. Only then place them in the discuard pile. 
When using module 3, as the Kaufman player, you will need to keep two separate piles: one collecting the guests whose order you completed this round and another one collecting the guests relevant to this objective. At the end of round, you score VP onl for the guests in the first pile, before moving any relevant guests to the second pile and discarding the rest.

cards.name: Manager's Son
cards.description: Each time you spend at least 1 champagne during an action, you get 1 krone

cards.name: E. Doolittle
cards.description:
Eliza must be sen to a ballroom; she cannot move into a room. In return, you can send an additional dancer that you must place on the same ballroom space as Eliza. You must pay the cost printed on the space only once (for Eliza only) and you get the row bonus only once.
Afterwards, score 1 VP for each dancer token you have in a ballroom, including Eliza and the second dancer token on the same space. I could have danced all night...

cards.name: M. Antoinette
cards.description:
Marie must move into a room. Additionally, you can send a dancer to a ballroom by paying 1 fewer champagne per other player in the game. In return, each other player gets 1 dish or drink of their choice (no champagne)
If you move Marie to her room in rounds 1-3, score 8 VP; in rounds 4-5 score 5 VP; in rounds 6-7, score 2 VP. Marie occupies a room and goes dancing anyway

cards.name: Lord Mayor of London
cards.description: Immediately score the current ballroom. It will be scored again as normal after the next Emperor scoring. Of couse, all players must participate in this additional scoring

cards.name: J. Gatsby & D. Buchanan
cards.description: Jay and Daisy must move into a room; they cannot be sent to a ballroom. In return, you can occupy an additional room (of any color) by turning it to the occupied side. Additionally, advance 4 spaces on the Emperor track. Please note that the cost is two of each depicted item. They prefer to stay in their rooms

cards.name: Ms. Hildegard
cards.description: Ms. Hildegard must move into a room; she cannot be sent to a ballroom

cards.name: Dr. Hagedorn
cards.description: Dr. Hagedorn cannot be sent to a ballroom, he must occupy two horizontally adjacent rooms (of the same or different colors). . Dr. Hageborn requires a double suite. If your hotel doesn't have oe, he'll wait at his table until you make one available

cards.name: Mr. Schulze
cards.description: Mr. Schulze can neither be sent to a ballroom nor occupy a room - he stays at his table indefinitely (which is why he has no cost). Instead, he is like a staff card (but is not considered one) that allows you, once per round, to spend any one item (dish, drink or champagne). If you do, you can immediately play a staff card from hand by paying its cost, score 1VP, and advance 1 space on the Emperor track. During final scoring, you do not lose 5 victory points for Mr. Schulze, even though he is still sitting in your café.

cards.name: J. Kesselhut
cards.description: Immediately fill the wine orders of your remaining guests with wine from the supply

cards.name: Mrs. Kunkel
cards.description: Mrs. Kunkel cannot be sent to a ballroom and she must occupy a room in the bottom floor. If you have no vacant rooms in the bottom floor left, ýou must make do with one fewer table for the rest of the game and, during final scoring suffer the negative 5 victory points for Mrs. Kunkel

cards.name: Camarero de Desayuno
cards.description: Una vez por ronda, puedes usar esta carta para obtener 1 strudel

cards.name: Camarera
cards.description: Una vez por ronda, puedes usar esta carta para obtener 1 pastel

cards.name: Barman
cards.description: Una vez por ronda, puedes usar esta carta para obtener 1 vino

cards.name: Subchef
cards.description: Una vez por ronda, puedes usar esta carta para obtener 1 café

cards.name: Mozo
cards.description: Cada vez que retires a un huésped rojo cuyo pedido completaste de tu café, obtienes 2 coronas

cards.name: Mozo de Cuadra
cards.description: Cada vez que retires a un huésped azul cuyo pedido completaste de tu café, puedes avanzar 1 espacio en la pista del Emperador

cards.name: Masajista
cards.description: Cada vez que retires a un huésped amarillo cuyo pedido completaste de tu café, obtienes 1 corona

cards.name: Guía Turístico
cards.description: Cada vez que retires a un huésped verde cuyo pedido completaste de tu café, obtienes 2 PV

cards.name: Mayordomo
cards.description: A partir de ahora, cada vez que prepares una habitación azul (de cualquier acción o esfuerzo), es gratis hacerlo (es decir, paga 0 coronas). Esto no otorga una acción gratuita, simplemente elimina el costo

cards.name: Chófer
cards.description: A partir de ahora, cada vez que prepares una habitación roja (de cualquier acción o esfuerzo), es gratis hacerlo (es decir, paga 0 coronas). Esto no otorga una acción gratuita, simplemente elimina el costo

cards.name: Florista
cards.description: A partir de ahora, cada vez que prepares una habitación amarilla (de cualquier acción o esfuerzo), es gratis hacerlo (es decir, paga 0 coronas). Esto no otorga una acción gratuita, simplemente elimina el costo

cards.name: Encargada del servicio de habitaciones
cards.description: Cada vez que tomes un dado que muestra 3 o 4, inmediatamente obtienes 2 PV

cards.name: Encargado de Restaurante
cards.description: Cada vez que tomes un dado que muestra 1 o 2, puedes aumentar 1 la fuerza de esa acción. Como siempre, puedes potenciar esto pagando 1 corona

cards.name: Decorador
cards.description: Cada vez que tomes un dado que muestra 1 o 2, antes o después de realizar la acción principal, también puedes preparar una habitación (de cualquier color) pagando el costo normal. No puedes realizar ninguna acción adicional entre la acción principal y la preparación de esa habitación

cards.name: Limpiabotas
cards.description: Ya no tienes que elegir al tomar un dado que muestra 4: Por cada dado en el espacio de acción, obtienes 1 corona y puedes avanzar 1 espacio en la pista del Emperador. Como siempre, puedes potenciar esto pagando 1 corona, por lo que también obtendrás 1 corona (de vuelta) y avanzarás 1 espacio en la pista del Emperador, ganando efectivamente un espacio gratis

cards.name: Lavandera
cards.description: Cada vez que tomes un dado que muestra 4, inmediatamente obtienes 4 PV

cards.name: Ayudante de Cocina
cards.description: Ya no tienes que pagar 1 corona al tomar un dado que muestra un 6; además, puedes aumentar en 1 la fuerza de esta acción. Como siempre, puedes potenciar esto pagando 1 corona. Para tu información: hemos aumentado el costo de esta carta de 3 coronas a 5 coronas

cards.name: Inspector
cards.description: Cada vez que tomes un dado que muestra 5, puedes añadir 2 a la fuerza de esta acción. En otras palabras, estás obteniendo un descuento adicional de 2 coronas

cards.name: Arquitecto de Interiores
cards.description: Cada vez que tomes un dado que muestra 3, inmediatamente obtienes 5 PV

cards.name: Detective
cards.description: Cada vez que tomes un dado que muestra 5, antes o después de realizar la acción principal, también puedes avanzar 2 espacios en la pista del Emperador. No puedes realizar ninguna acción adicional entre la acción principal y el avance en la pista del Emperador

cards.name: Chef
cards.description: Inmediatamente (y solo una vez) obtienes 1 strudel, 1 pastel, 1 vino y 1 café

cards.name: Gerente de Personal
cards.description: Cada vez que tomes un dado que muestra 3, antes o después de realizar la acción principal, también puedes jugar una carta de personal desde la mano pagando su costo. No puedes realizar ninguna acción adicional entre la acción principal y jugar la carta de personal

cards.name: Conserje
cards.description: Cada vez que ocupes una habitación (por cualquier medio), también obtienes 1 corona

cards.name: Jefe de Meseros
cards.description: A partir de ahora, mover artículos de tu cocina a tus invitados no te costará nada

cards.name: Repartidor
cards.description: A partir de ahora, tomar invitados de la fila no te costará nada. Esto no proporciona un invitado, solo elimina el costo

cards.name: Gerente de Conferencias
cards.description: A partir de ahora, puedes pagar 1 corona para ignorar la penalización durante una puntuación del Emperador

cards.name: Gerente de Reservas
cards.description: Durante la puntuación final, obtén 3 PV adicionales por cada habitación roja ocupada en tu hotel

cards.name: Conserje
cards.description: Durante la puntuación final, obtén 3 PV adicionales por cada habitación azul ocupada en tu hotel

cards.name: Secretaria
cards.description: Durante la puntuación final, selecciona una carta de personal en juego de un oponente con el símbolo (Fin del Juego) y aplica su efecto a tu hotel. No puedes usar esto para copiar una de tus propias cartas de personal. Si ninguno de tus oponentes tiene personal con el símbolo (Fin del Juego) en juego, la secretaria no obtiene nada

cards.name: Recepcionista
cards.description: Durante la puntuación final, obtén 3 PV adicionales por cada habitación amarilla ocupada en tu hotel

cards.name: Camarera
cards.description: Durante la puntuación final, obtén 1 PV adicional por cada habitación ocupada en tu hotel, sin importar el color

cards.name: Asistente de Gerente
cards.description: Durante la puntuación final, obtén 2 PV por cada carta de personal que tengas en juego (independientemente del tipo), incluyendo esta

cards.name: Encargado de Piso
cards.description: Cada vez que retires a un huésped rojo cuyo pedido completaste de tu café, si el pedido requería 4 (o más) artículos, obtén 4 PV

cards.name: Recepcionista
cards.description: Durante la puntuación final, obtén (un adicional) 1 PV por cada ficha de habitación en tu hotel, independientemente del color y del lado que esté hacia arriba

cards.name: Botones
cards.description: Inmediatamente (y solo una vez) ocupa hasta 2 habitaciones (de cualquier color) en tu hotel al girarlas al lado ocupado

cards.name: Sommelier
cards.description: Inmediatamente (y solo una vez) obtén 4 vinos

cards.name: Servicio de Habitaciones
cards.description: Durante la puntuación final, obtén 2 PV por cada grupo de habitaciones completamente ocupadas (de cualquier color) en tu hotel

cards.name: Portero
cards.description: Inmediatamente (y solo una vez) llena el pedido de un invitado tomando los artículos requeridos del suministro

cards.name: Confitero
cards.description: Inmediatamente (y solo una vez) obtén 4 pasteles

cards.name: Director de Marketing
cards.description: Durante la puntuación final, obtén 5 PV por cada carta de objetivo que tenga tu marcador

cards.name: Operador
cards.description: Durante la puntuación final, obtén un número de PV igual al doble de tu posición en la pista del Emperador. Recuerda, pierdes 7 espacios después de la puntuación final del Emperador; por lo tanto, normalmente obtendrás como máximo 12 PV del Operador. Bajo las condiciones adecuadas, sin embargo, puedes obtener más de 12 PV. Esto no estaba permitido en las primeras ediciones, pero ahora sí lo está

cards.name: Jardinero
cards.description: Cada vez que obtienes la recompensa durante la puntuación del Emperador, además, obtén 5 PV

cards.name: Barista
cards.description: Inmediatamente (y solo una vez) obtén 4 cafés

cards.name: Cocinero de Almacén
cards.description: Inmediatamente (y solo una vez) obtén 4 strudels

cards.name: Encargado de la Piscina
cards.description: Inmediatamente (y solo una vez) avanza 3 espacios en la pista del Emperador

cards.name: Limiadora de planta
cards.description: Durante la puntuación final, obtén 5 PV por cada piso en tu hotel que tenga todas sus habitaciones ocupadas

cards.name: Ascensorista
cards.description: Durante la puntuación final, obtén 5 PV por cada columna en tu hotel que tenga todas sus habitaciones ocupadas

cards.name: Director del Hotel
cards.description: Durante la puntuación final, obtén 4 PV por cada conjunto de habitaciones rojas, azules y amarillas ocupadas que tengas en tu hotel. En otras palabras, obtienes 4 PV por cada habitación ocupada del color que tengas menos

cards.name: Escultor
cards.description: Puedes preparar una habitación (de cualquier color) sin costo; debes elegir una habitación en los dos pisos inferiores de tu tablero de hotel. Si los dos pisos inferiores ya están llenos de habitaciones, no obtendrás nada con esto, lo siento

cards.name: Músico
cards.description: Roba 1 carta de personal del mazo y añádela a tu mano. Además, puedes preparar una habitación (de cualquier color) pagando el costo normal

cards.name: Compositor
cards.description: Obtienes 1 strudel

cards.name: Sastre
cards.description: Obtienes 1 strudel y 2 coronas

cards.name: Bailarina
cards.description: Obtienes 1 café y puedes avanzar 2 espacios en la pista del Emperador

cards.name: Retratista
cards.description: Obtienes 1 plato o bebida de tu elección y 2 coronas

cards.name: Fotógrafo
cards.description: Roba 2 cartas de personal del mazo y añádelas a tu mano

cards.name: Vocalista
cards.description: Obtienes 1 pastel. Además, puedes jugar una carta de personal desde la mano, pagando hasta 3 coronas menos

cards.name: Arquitecto
cards.description: Puedes preparar hasta dos habitaciones (de cualquier color), pagando 1 corona menos por cada una

cards.name: Actriz
cards.description: Puedes ocupar una habitación adicional (de cualquier color) girándola al lado ocupado. La actriz podría usar una habitación adicional para su personal

cards.name: Poeta
cards.description: Obtienes 1 pastel. Además, puedes jugar una carta de personal desde la mano, pagando hasta 2 coronas menos

cards.name: Diseñador de Joyas
cards.description: Obtienes 1 café y 3 coronas

cards.name: Pintor
cards.description: Puedes preparar hasta dos habitaciones: Paga 1 corona menos por una de ellas; si eliges preparar una segunda, debes pagar el costo normal

cards.name: Cantante de Ópera
cards.description: Puedes tomar un invitado de la fila sin costo. Además, puedes avanzar 3 espacios en la pista del Emperador

cards.name: Dama
cards.description: Puedes tomar un invitado de la fila sin costo

cards.name: Duquesa
cards.description: Puedes jugar una carta de personal desde la mano, pagando 1 corona menos

cards.name: Caballero del Imperio
cards.description: Sin efecto. Al menos vale 3 PV

cards.name: Landgrave
cards.description: Puedes jugar una carta de personal desde la mano, pagando 1 corona menos. Además, puedes preparar una habitación (de cualquier color) pagando el costo normal

cards.name: Soberano
cards.description: Roba 2 cartas de personal del mazo y añádelas a tu mano. Además, puedes avanzar 2 espacios en la pista del Emperador

cards.name: Princesa
cards.description: Puedes avanzar 3 espacios en la pista del Emperador

cards.name: Condesa
cards.description: Obtienes 3 coronas

cards.name: Elector
cards.description: Puedes jugar una carta de personal desde la mano, pagando 1 corona menos. Además, puedes avanzar 3 espacios en la pista del Emperador

cards.name: Barón
cards.description: Puedes preparar una habitación (de cualquier color) sin costo

cards.name: Príncipe
cards.description: Puedes ocupar una habitación adicional (de cualquier color) girándola al lado ocupado. El príncipe podría usar una habitación adicional para su séquito

cards.name: Conde
cards.description: Puedes jugar hasta dos cartas de personal desde la mano, pagando 1 corona menos por cada una

cards.name: Earl
cards.description: Obtienes 1 corona

cards.name: Baronesa
cards.description: Roba 3 cartas de personal del mazo y juega una de ellas de inmediato, pagando hasta 3 coronas menos. Devuelve las otras dos cartas al fondo del mazo, en el orden que prefieras. Si las tres cartas son demasiado caras para ti, o no deseas jugar ninguna de ellas, debes devolver las tres al fondo del mazo

cards.name: Duque
cards.description: Roba 3 cartas de personal del mazo y juega una de ellas de inmediato sin costo. Devuelve las otras dos cartas al fondo del mazo, en el orden que prefieras

cards.name: Boticario
cards.description: Obtienes 1 corona

cards.name: Consejero de Correos
cards.description: Puedes tomar un invitado de la fila sin costo

cards.name: Consejero Privado
cards.description: Obtienes 1 corona y puedes avanzar 1 espacio en la pista del Emperador

cards.name: Profesor Emérito
cards.description: Puedes tomar un invitado de la fila sin costo

cards.name: General
cards.description: Obtienes 1 vino y 3 coronas

cards.name: Consejero Mayor
cards.description: Puedes ocupar una habitación adicional (de cualquier color) girándola al lado ocupado. El Consejero Mayor podría usar una habitación adicional para su secretario

cards.name: Consejero de Comercio
cards.description: Obtienes 5 coronas

cards.name: Consejero Judicial
cards.description: Obtienes 3 coronas. Además, puedes tomar un invitado de la fila sin costo

cards.name: Mayor
cards.description: Obtienes 3 coronas

cards.name: Consejero Veterinario
cards.description: Puedes jugar una carta de personal desde la mano, pagando hasta 3 coronas menos

cards.name: Consejero Médico
cards.description: Obtienes 3 coronas. Además, puedes tomar hasta dos invitados de la fila sin costo. Reabastece la fila antes de tomar el segundo invitado

cards.name: Procurador
cards.description: Puedes preparar hasta dos habitaciones (de cualquier color), ambas sin costo

cards.name: Alto Comisionado
cards.description: Obtienes 4 coronas

cards.name: Secretario Legal Senior
cards.description: Obtienes 1 vino y 3 coronas

cards.name: Tezcatlipoca
cards.description: Roba 3 cartas de personal del mazo y añádelas a tu mano

cards.name: Capitán Goldhaken
cards.description: Obtienes 1 corona

cards.name: Sr. Horsa
cards.description: Puedes avanzar 1 espacio en la pista del Emperador

cards.name: M. Ingalls
cards.description: Puedes jugar una carta de personal desde la mano, pagando 1 corona menos

cards.name: Sr. Boydell
cards.description: Puedes avanzar 2 espacios en la pista del Emperador. Nota: Esto no te permite despejar escombros de la pista; todo el personal debe permanecer en el hotel durante este juego

cards.name: Sr. Oundo
cards.description: Puedes jugar una carta de personal desde la mano, pagando hasta 3 coronas menos

cards.name: E. Gizia
cards.description: Selecciona un espacio de acción con al menos un dado y realiza la acción como normalmente, pero sin tomar un dado de ese espacio. No puedes potenciar esta acción. Las cartas de personal que proporcionan beneficios por tomar un dado específico no pueden usarse, ya que no estás tomando un dado con esto. Esto no es un turno adicional, sino parte de tu turno actual, justo después de enviar a E. Gizia a una habitación y recoger todos los demás beneficios de él. Esto no afecta tu acción principal, para la cual debes tomar un dado, de ninguna manera. Para tu información; hemos debilitado el efecto en comparación con ediciones anteriores, en las que obtendrías un turno adicional

cards.name: Marco Polo
cards.description: Obtienes 4 coronas

cards.name: Cramersófolo
cards.description: Roba 1 carta de personal del mazo y añádela a tu mano. Además, puedes avanzar 2 espacios en la pista del Emperador

cards.name: Granjero Franz
